title: Burger Alarm [REUPLOAD]
author: EpicToast
description:
The last thing you'd want in your Burger King burger is somebody's time bomb, but as it turns out, that might be what you get.

Original module by Marksam32. Concept by willycel123. Everything else by me.

This is a reupload of EpicToast's module with changes and bug fixes. Unsubscribe from the old version here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1660329102

[url=https://ktane.timwi.de/HTML/Burger%20Alarm.html]Manual HTML[/url]
[url=https://ktane.timwi.de/PDF/Burger%20Alarm.pdf]Manual PDF[/url]
